definition: of or relating to entozoa, any of various parasites that live in the internal organs of animals (especially intestinal worms)
details:
adjective
- of or relating to entozoa
= synonyms: entozoan
noun
- any of various parasites that live in the internal organs of animals (especially intestinal worms)
= synonyms: endoparasite, entoparasite, entozoon, entozoan
